step.cmd: When you open TMXEditor from the official installers for the first time, or when the Subscription Key is not registered, the following dialog is displayed: Register Subscription Dialog
If you have a Subscription Key, type it in the Subscription Key text box and click the Register Subscription button.
step.stepresult: On registration success, the main editing screen will be presented.

step.cmd: If you don't have a Subscription Key and wish to test the program during 7 days, click the Request Evaluation Key button.
step.stepresult: The following dialog appears: Request Evaluation Key Dialog

step.cmd: Enter the requested data and click the Request Evaluation Key button.
step.stepresult: On success, an email with the requested Evaluation Key will be sent to the indicated address and the following dialog will be displayed: Request Received Dialog Check your email and register the Evaluation Key using the instructions shown above.
